title: Above All Grand Salon & Spa

description: A Premiere Salon and Spa located in Wexford, PA
cleaned_text: Experience the serenity of an Energy Session. Calm the fight, flight or freeze response so you feel grounded. Learn simple techniques to help deal with overwhelm and anxiety better. Reduce pain and strengthen your immune system. Customize your self-care with Ayurveda and honor your body's unique constitutional makeup. Each session is completely unique and tailored to your individual needs. 60-90Min Experience the potential for abundant shifts in psyche, body & spirit. This treatment couples Energy Medicine with the transmission of crystals and clairvoyance - with Linda Varos 60 Minutes Above All Grand Salon & Spa 1025 Wexford Plaza Drive, Wexford, Pennsylvania 15090, United States Copyright © 2023 Above All Grand Salon & Spa - All Rights Reserved.
